description: A vast, cold chamber where shadows cling to the stone walls. Faint whispers echo from every direction, though no source can be seen.
A corridor of cracked stone that smells of damp rot. The air feels heavy, as though watching you.

items.description: Foul-smelling water drips steadily from the cracked ceiling.
Jagged claw marks gouge the stone walls, deep and fresh as though recently made.

description: An iron-barred room reeking of rust and old blood. The silence here is suffocating.

items.description: Shattered chains lie scattered across the floor, their iron links twisted and broken.
Broken manacles hang from the walls, their edges sharp with rust.

description: A damp crypt lined with crumbling alcoves. The ground trembles faintly with scratching noises below.

items.description: A bruised apple, its skin mottled and blackened as though rotting from within.
items.eatDescription: The apple tastes bitter and foul. As you swallow, a shiver crawls down your spine.

description: A narrow hall where darkness twists with every flicker of light. The walls seem to shift with each passing shadow.

items.description: Flickering torches cling to the walls. The flames sputter and gasp as though choking for air.
